lender.name: Mark and Alistair

lender.name: Ben Monarch
lender.loan_because: Microfinance provides a dignified and effective means of encouraging entrepreneurialism within emerging economies. For too long the attitude has been to simply provide handouts, which have (in some cases) bred dependency and demeaned aid recipients. Microfinance creates an equal partnership between creditor and debtor, which can then be an example to others within emerging economies that if the entrepreneurial spirit is alive then there is a means to finance it. Furthermore, microfinance lacks the presumption that loaners-know-best, and instead puts faith in the borrower to apply his or her financing toward a worthy endeavor. Lastly, microfinance embodies the most admirable quality of capitalism, that being; if someone wishes to improve their way of life they can do so if they try. Microfinance can provide the world with a new vision for development, and in the process forge bonds which transcend borders and establish that with diligence, goals, and capital we can always make tomorrow better than today.

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of one person helping another.

lender.name: Sabine
lender.loan_because: The idea came with mij birthday. Instead of a personal gift I asked mij guests to give an amount for Kiva. Thks. to mij friends en guests.

lender.occupational_info: Rob is a business manager & Lorenza runs her own cleaning business.

lender.name: Chien
lender.loan_because:
I immigrated here with my family when I was 8 years old. We didn't have a lot growing up and we bounced around from state to state and city to city living with other families, sometimes in cramped and roach infested apartments.
Growing up, people use to tell me all the time that I couldn't do this or I couldn't do that. But they were wrong. When I joined the work force, all it took was one person to believe in me to set me on the path that has taken me to where I am today. I just needed an opportunity, and when that day came I did everything I could to maximize it. There is nothing special or unique about me or my story. Kiva is full of people that are motivated and believe in themselves, just like me. People that aren't asking for handouts, but asking others to believe in them.
The money that I'm lending here doesn't mean a lot to me, and its better used to provide an opportunity for someone else to better themselves and better their families. All we can ask for is an opportunity to do what we believe we can do. I am happy to help provide opportunities and I hope to do much more in the future.

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: There are so many people out there trying to make a living and all they need is a helping hand. It makes me feel good to know I am helping.
lender.occupational_info: I help people out of pain from past injuries.

lender.name: Adja Mareme
lender.loan_because: I want to help people fufill their dreams and achieve the goals they set for their lives. I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help people build their financial freedom

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I think this idea is so simple and yet amazingly inspiring!

lender.name: NaB
lender.loan_because: What you "spent" today will be paid tomorrow and The Day After.
lender.occupational_info: Small business in the Global Industry.

lender.occupational_info: I have the privilege of working with some motivated young students who want to live out the Abrahamic blessing of sharing and helping to improve lives for the glory of God! I and the other leaders have the opportunity to work with some kids who are future world changers!

lender.name: huang
lender.loan_because: I come from a small town of China, 22-year-old, I was born in a traditional family, and now I accomplish nothing, not after graduating from secondary school in the community stroll, a few years ago infatuated with the Internet Apart from the Internet every day does not do anything, the last two years .... regret started auto repair, China is very unfair to this industry has suffered all kinds of discrimination ..... I see elderly parents and also for my hard work, the heads of white hair parents more and more, I felt miserable, and for my father, despite his aging body to the village planting fruit trees , Whenever I think here, Xiangku ..... I acknowledge that he is one of the Yong Ping, now I am still dependent on their parents to survive, I would like to change Change their own destiny in our local green energy use is not high, according to the situation on the ground I would like to engage in the development and utilization of bio-diesel, but I do not have enough money, so I think the One way in China in recent years of false products and false advertising more and more, China has A law, "If someone buy products can be double false claims" I would like to take this a law, the initiative to buy these false product, and then get double pay , And I have some start-up funds, but these were not enough, I hope you can help , I need a loan for the purchase of bio-diesel production equipment, I can not promise to you Bring you much return, but please believe that, I will do our utmost to do a good job! My English is not very good, please forgive! Thank you!

Saya memimpikan memiliki sebuah perusahaan sendiri dimana saya bisa membantu orang dengan memperkejakan mereka , apakah anda dapat membantu saya mewujudkan mimpi saya ini? dan membantu keluarga saya khususnya anak saya keluar dari masalah ini? terima kasih . TUHAN YESUS MEMBERKATI
lender.occupational_info: Saya membutuhkan dana sekitar US $ 3500 - 5000 , untuk membangun usaha kontraktor umum yang akan bergerak di bidang pembangunan serta perawatan jalan serta penyediaan barang-barang kebutuhan perusahaan pemerintah , please send Your E-mail to : tori_tommyhuwae@yahoo.co.id thanks God Bless You All

lender.occupational_info: I was lucky to have worked in the business world of computers and marketing for 30 years and I now am retired and in fairly good health.

lender.loan_because: Operating a business is extremely difficult. I have witnessed my husband's own struggles with attaining financing in order to keep our businesses afloat. We are sympathetic these such obstacles.

lender.loan_because: I want to help families
lender.occupational_info: I am a 7 year old kid, this is my birthday money.

lender.name: Jon and Heather
lender.loan_because: While governmental action is crucial to helping end extreme poverty, it alone is not sufficient. Muhammad Yunus has shown us that personal action, through small and seemingly insignificant loans, can and does make a long-term difference in other people's lives. Extreme poverty should not just be accepted as a fact of life, and we believe that this is one way to help in the struggle against poverty.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: There are people in this world that have great ambitions and I am proud to help them achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Certified Financial Planner. I assist people in achieving their financial goals and objectives by coordinating with other professionals in the areas of estate planning, tax planning, charitable planning and insurance planning.

lender.name: PinaWongFoundation
lender.loan_because:
Josefina "Pina" Wong was born on May 31, 1923 in Leon, Nicaragua. She had a long and fulfilling life which included starting up and running Supermercados Wong, a successful grocery store business with her husband Juan Wong.
In loving memory of Pinita and Juan Wong, their family and friends have come together to start a grass-roots foundation to help struggling families in Latin America and Asia (Pina was 1/2 Chinese and 1/2 Nicaraguan and Juan was 100% Chinese). We wish to give others the opportunity to "lift themselves by the bootstraps" out of poverty and into more productive, fulfilling lives just like Pina and Juan did... with the help of a small loan!

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I have been searching for some thing to do to give back. This is some thing I feel strongly about!
lender.occupational_info: My day to day work is being a home maker and mother. I do sell clothing on E-bay as a way to make extra money.

lender.name: Sean & Sawyer
lender.loan_because: We can and its fun. I'm teaching my 7 year old son Sawyer about philanthropy...
lender.occupational_info: I am a practicioner of the gentle art of teaching people about the joy they can derive from charitable giving. I'm with the Community Environmental Council in Santa Barbara, California. The CEC is a 38 year old environmental non-profit focused on energy efficiency and renewables, alternative transportation, peak oil and climate change. Our goal is to reduce the communitys carbon footprint by ending our regions dependency on fossil fuels in one generation- Fossil Free by 33!

lender.name: Jesie
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I receive and respond to incoming emails and phone calls at Driver's Way, a used car superstore.

lender.loan_because: I hope that the the people of the world can live in peace.That means food in the belly, and the right to work at a job that gives satisfaction.
lender.occupational_info: I love books and reading, thus I work in a university library.

lender.name: Bmidget722
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who are helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I perform diagnostic lab tests in a children's hospital

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: By pure luck, I am very fortunate and I want to share my good fortune with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am an assistant to an investment manager who gives financial advice to wealthy individuals.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women have the same opportunities I have had in life.
lender.occupational_info: I run/organize the sports/activities for the students at a public university.

lender.name: Peter
lender.occupational_info: Restaurant

lender.name: Felicia
lender.loan_because: I can. And since I can, I should. And since I should, I'm doing it. I recommend it to others.
lender.occupational_info: Pushing papers and talking to people.

lender.name: Emil
lender.loan_because: I want to make a change and to help people all over the globe. So easy as it sounds like :)

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: microfinance is cool
lender.occupational_info: work on Xbox and other MS devices.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I hope to be able to help a small business owner in the world expand their business to make life better for them and the people they sell to.
lender.occupational_info: Sales, sales, sales!

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I took out loans to go to school, which was critical in getting the work I now do to earn a living. So, it makes me happy to be able to provide loans that can help someone else invest in their future.

lender.name: Hayes
lender.loan_because: it gives people the ability to help themselves.

lender.name: Nazareth Academy
lender.loan_because: We want to learn what challenges people in other parts of the world encounter, and we want to help them overcome these challenges and become self-sufficient. It feels good too!
lender.occupational_info: We are students and teachers at a private Catholic school in Illinois.

lender.name: Meg and Alex
lender.loan_because: It is in honor of our wedding day and the guests who celebrated with us.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: "We must be the change we wish to see in the world." Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: I get to help people understand their dogs better so as to strengthen the relationship that they have with them. Hopefully this will lead to less abuse or even euthanasia of dogs.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: As a business man I want to help other business owners shape their own futures.
lender.occupational_info: Providing advice on how to grow and protect my clients wealth.

lender.name: SB Homies
lender.occupation: A Home Group of Santa Barbara Community Church
lender.loan_because: it seems like one good way to use our resources to promote life, love, and health in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of people trying to live life in true community. As part of that, we get together on Wednesday nights to worship God by hanging out, singing, studying the bible, and eating.

lender.name: Ellyn
lender.loan_because: it's important to stretch out a helping hand as many times as one can.

lender.name: Javon
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own business and clientele. People see me privately to get there hair cut and styled.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I want to help to make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Erlin
lender.loan_because: to change one's life

lender.name: Circle of Intention
lender.loan_because: The Circle of Intention works to create peace around the world and helping people acheive economic freedom supports that goal.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of people who wish to see the earth heal as gently as possible and who support the Oneness of All.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate in my life to be surrounded by people who support my goals and dreams -- I want to keep that cycle going.

lender.name: Hasham
lender.loan_because: People's desire to live a batter life; its motivating and humbling all wrapped into one.
lender.occupational_info: As an Entrepreneur, I love the fact when a money partner believes in my vision and helps me achieve my dreams. KIVA provides me with a great opportunity to be able to do the same for someone else.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: someone needs my money way more than I do
lender.occupational_info: i learn so i can someday help the world

lender.name: radRounds.org
lender.loan_because: Our goal is to help entrepreneurs around the world realize their goals and allow them to make a mark and help their community. We are particularly interested in health-related ventures and entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: We are an organization that provides a platform for radiologists (physicians who specialize in medical imaging) to connect to each other and to collaborate with each other.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: Seems like a good idea
lender.occupational_info: I program computers for Business

lender.name: Jesuismoi
lender.occupational_info: I supervise people making Internet pages.

lender.name: Rene
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: Fulfilling, satisfying, rewarding... I Love my job !

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I like to help others

lender.occupational_info: I work in a technical support roll for a company that makes electronic equipment.

lender.name: Issac
lender.loan_because: It is meaningful.

lender.name: Amsterdam Escape
lender.loan_because:
We remember how, when starting our own business, we needed a loan and no-one would take the risk.
Now our business is a success, we offer the best short-stay apartments in Amsterdam and are in a position to help others.
lender.occupational_info:
We operate vacation rental apartments for tourists wishing to visit Amsterdam.
Amsterdam Escape offers luxury vacation apartments with a difference.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: It helps the world get to where it needs to be
lender.occupational_info: I'm a waitress, I serve people food

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: We started a school year reading project with our 1st grade daughter. From that, we developed the "Kiva Challenge". As a way to help encourage reading, finances and savings accounts, we decided that we would also make an impact one person and group at a time across the world. KIVA.org has enabled us to try and make a difference not only for our family, but for people and families across the world. We believe in the power of micro-finance and are excited to help!
lender.occupational_info: I market and sell beverages.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: It takes money to make money. I am certain that brilliance and talent are wasted every day just by being born in the wrong place and the wrong time.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a team that helps about 200 people access information. Each day, I never know exactly what is going to happen or what problems will arise. I listen to people, make observations, research, triage problems and work on ways to save time.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. I don't have a lot of money for an American (and I do have a lot of debt), but I am conscious of the extreme luxury I live in when compared with many parts of the world, and I can do this to try to level the playing field a little bit.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student.

lender.name: Proofreading Services
lender.loan_because: I want others to have the same opportunities that I have in Australia.
lender.occupational_info: Checking documents and books for spelling, punctuation and grammar errors.

lender.name: Amsterdam Stay
lender.loan_because: Helping people is so good
lender.occupational_info: We offer vacation properties in Amsterdam.

lender.name: Jack
lender.occupational_info: I develop websites and software applications to help people solve business problems.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I have a group of women friends and we place our spare money in a jar and do random acts of kindness with it - from giving children bicycles to paying bills for people. We have decided to include Kiva to our circle of sharing.
lender.occupational_info: I am a life coach and clairvoyant/medium who is currently taking the photographs to be used in healing work. Also designing cards that allow people to reflect on their life path and choices open to them.

lender.occupational_info: I am a stay-at-home mom raising my 4 kids. My oldest is 18 and youngest is 10.

lender.loan_because: My husband & I wanted to help a family in farming. I grew up on a farm and my father farmed all of his life.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a secretary for a school. Also I work in a local super market as a cashier. My husband is an electrician. We have a daughter who is 14 years old.

lender.name: Trina
lender.loan_because: It's such an easy and effective way to share resources.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I started my own business over four years ago and now that I have my own successful business I'd like to help someone else become successful, I think its important to give back. lender.occupational_info: My work involves 'bush medicine business' and much of my energy is directed to better empowering the Indigenous people here in Western Australia.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I feel guilty for being a bad person, and I'm trying to buy my way into heaven.
lender.occupational_info: i work as hard as they do, but for more money.

lender.name: Jay & Leticia
lender.loan_because: It's a great feeling to help someone reach a professional goal and dream. It's human nature to want to lend a hand!
lender.occupational_info: We work in Global Trade and at a local College.

lender.name: Scott

lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info:
I facilitate the review of new pharmaceuticals to ensure that they are safe and effective. I hope for the day that my job is not necessary because of the greed of individuals, corporations and stockholders.
I teach to change the world for the better. I will never win a Nobel Prize. One of my students just might.

lender.name: Melissa Valdovinos
lender.loan_because: I believe in offering others the means to fulfill their potential.

lender.name: Olivia
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good & I hope it makes other people feel good
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in grade four.

lender.name: Heidi

lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired glassblower, and I rehabilitate small abused dogs. I love to sew, paint, silversmith and I cook for families in Hospice on our little island.

lender.name: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo
lender.loan_because: more here: http://gmaresign.blogspot.com/

lender.name: Jeannette
lender.loan_because: I think the idea of microcredit loans are a phenomenal idea. I saw a segment on the Today show about loans. I grew up hearing once person can make a difference, and realized these loans were a perfect opportunity for me to help make a difference in someone elses life.
lender.occupational_info: I help business owners communicate the benefits of their products to consumers.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I went to El Salvador in 2000, and developed a real sense of the spirit of the people in small, Central American communities. They are sweet, hard-working, and have the strongest spirit I have ever seen!
lender.occupational_info: I help companies of all sizes identify ways to make their business better - save money, get more out of their customers, and streamline the business processes.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of micro-loans and I'm happy to be able to participate and know that I am supporting people who want to improve themselves and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time volunteer in a year long service program, where I am working for a food pantry for low income people.

lender.name: Ramon
lender.occupational_info: I am working as an Account Manager (small business) for the Rabobank Key Accountabilities / Activities: To relationship manage a portfolio of small business customers by meeting the total banking needs of the customer, both personal and business. The portfolio will primarily contain small business customers whose business needs are generally straightforward. Typical small businesses managed at this level would include: small to medium sized agriculture operations; small to medium sized franchises; businesses with one or two locations; many professionals and small trades. Meet the personal needs of these small business customers, which may range from simple to complex, by profiling, referring, promoting, selling, cross-selling, up selling and delivering a full range of personal banking products and services, including several sophisticated products.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs someone to help them realize their dreams.

lender.name: Clare Broome
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to set a good example for my son, helping him to see no matter how little we have, we still have to ability to help make life a little better for other people just like us across the world
lender.occupational_info: I used to work helping other lone parents across Europe to overcome the barriers they face, both internally and externally, and to make a better life for themselves and their children. In the past I've done lots of different jobs from cleaning toilets to teaching English to selling wedding dresses and I've just set up my own business as a Fine Art Model - quite a change from my last job! My most important job however will always be raising my son - he's a great kid and I am very proud of him.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: Such a simple thing can make a huge difference in lives a world away.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a charitable organization that supports older people suffering with different stages of dementia. I help organize conferences, education and training.

lender.name: Bryant
lender.loan_because: as corny as it sounds , I'd like to make a difference.......having travelled internationally rather extensively , i have a good understanding of lifes hardships and simple pleasures.
lender.occupational_info: I inspect , maintain , and repair airplanes. jetliners.........

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate enough to have been given a wonderful life provided to me by my parents. I feel it is important to help those who have been less fortunate. There isn't a better feeling in the world than helping someone succeed in life.

lender.name: Int'l Dev. Club
lender.loan_because: Our college faculty, staff and students are concerned about developmental inequities and obstacles and wish to assist through microcredit.

lender.name: Tinklenberg Family
lender.loan_because: God has blessed our family so much that I want to share those blessings with others.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a reason why I shouldn't.

lender.occupational_info: I own three facilities in different cities that maintain cars and trucks including washing them, changing their oil and other general maintenance. I employ about 175 people.

lender.occupational_info: I am a musician and both perform and help others to add beauty to the world.

lender.occupational_info: I'm 10 years old and in the fifth grade.

lender.name: servaas
lender.loan_because: If my money can contribute to the wellfare of a family, by giving them the possibility to create their own business and improve their lives without me telling them what they should do, it will be the money that works as a seed. When they are able to pay me back I will again lend it to someone else. And so the seed becomes harvest. It's an honour to be in the position to do this. It's as simple as that.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I am loaning funds to assist women in their endeavours to support themselves and their families. I want to donate in the name of an angelic child ....Aleena. I know that when she is old enough to understand she will appreciate this action and my hope is that she will someday take the initiative to do the same. They have a strong and capable Mother that will lead by her amazing example. She will learn much from her and Mom from both her daughters!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am a lettercarrier delivering the Nation's mail in all kinds of environmental conditions. I am paid the same wage my male counterparts. In my Union.....equal pay for equal work. Equal rights for all. Human Rights are paramount for all workers!!!

lender.name: JACOB T
lender.loan_because: just wanted to help if i could

lender.name: Chris H.
lender.loan_because: I want to feel better about this world. I don't want to have my $$ subsumed into a large charity whose CEO gets $200,000+ a year.
lender.occupational_info: I am an animal doctor, but I am not working right now. I took an oath when I started this career. Most of the oath is not about helping animals, though. It is about helping humans stay safe and healthy, through healthy food and water.

lender.name: Mara
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to be at a great point in my life and I would like to help others reach the same point - step by step

lender.name: Vivie
lender.occupational_info: Improving the quality of life, and the standard of living for people who are most in need.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because:
In Spring 2008, I had the privileged of meeting Mr. Muhammad Yunus, the man who employed the concept of micro-lending. After hearing him speak and shaking his hand, I knew that I needed to join in the fight of making poverty history.
Additionally, I believe in acting justly and loving mercy. Micro-lending fits into both.
